account-not-confirmed: User account has not been confirmed
previous-password: Previous password cannot be set as new one
wrong-picture-format: Wrong format of the uploaded picture
two-fa-not-set-up: MFA has not been set up
phone-not-set-up: Mobile phone has not been set up

validation.mfa-code-should-be-6-digit-code: MFA code should be 6 digit code
validation.phone-code-should-be-6-digit-code: Phone code should be 6 digit code
validation.wrong-first-name-length: Min length of the first name is 1 symbol, max is 64 symbols
validation.wrong-first-name-format: First name should be a string
validation.wrong-last-name-length: Min length of the last name is 1 symbol, max is 64 symbols
validation.wrong-last-name-format: Last name should be a string
validation.wrong-location-length: Min length of the location is 8 symbols, max is 128 symbols
validation.wrong-company-length: Min length of the company is 2 symbols, max is 64 symbols
validation.user-photo-must-be-base64: User profile photo must be PNG Base64-encoded
validation.wrong-role-value: Wrong value of a member role

email-already-taken: Provided email address has already been taken
password-already-changed: Password was changed less than 24h ago
company-members-limit-reached: You've reached the limit of users you can invite while registration
member-already-on-list: Company member is already on the list
company-already-exists: Company with this name already exists
phone-already-taken: Mobile phone has already been taken
